text: Is there a way to make to logo in a header template change to another logo on scroll? I know I could possibly do it with JavaScript and changing images but is there a better way?

Hello everyone :raised_hands:!

> On our website, we have a demo request form in our websites. It's a HubSpot form.
*Depending on the country, we want to redirect two different success pages after the visitor submits the form.*
For example, if someone is from the US, we want to redirect them to "Page A".
Other than the US, we want them to go to "Page B"

*Anyone know how we can fix it?* :face_with_rolling_eyes:

PS: Basically we have different SDR teams one from india another one from US.
US team only take care of US leads so
On the thank you page we have embedded a link to the meeting.
Hello ev one, Does HubSpot have a WhatsApp community group?, this platform is not familiar to me and I'm having a little trouble logging in :(

Hi everyone,

I was lead here by one of the HubSpot support-colleagues.
Can anyone help me and give me some insights on URL redirection with HubSpot? We are wondering if HubSpot might solve our problem with the URL redirect feature.

All the best,
Frederik

Hello everyone, we are using HubSpot plugin with woocommerce and i have some questions, in which channel should i ask?
Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi <@U028QE2PEPN>, are you using HubSpot for WooCommerce integration, if yes then you can reach out to us directly at - <http://makewebbetter.com/contact-us|makewebbetter.com/contact-us> or can email us at <mailto:support@makewebbetter.com|support@makewebbetter.com>
Hi Frederik, what type of information are you looking for about HubSpot's URL Redirect feature?

If the redirect url is showing up as empty, then I imagine it’s one of those personalization tokens actually not populating: I would try to reach out to HubSpot support in order to be able to provide more details on the flow that this form is created with: from those screenshots alone I don’t have the access to the portal where the operations are taking place, so the most info I can provide is just conjecture :thinking_face:

But in the case of the redirectUrl being empty, this would not be the fault of the forms embed code, it would be the fault of the personalization token actually not populating in time :thinking_face:

From the Forms side of things, I don’t know if I can provide any further guidance looking at the context in this one, but from what I’ve tested on previous cases of issues that didn’t have personalization tokens, this behavior seems to line up with no redirect url being specified, it being empty or undefined.

Hi, everyone! We are working with behavioral events coming from Segment into HubSpot and have a question / need someone to help us with a few details. In which channel should I ask for help? Thanks in advance!
